column1: I'm holding a 📞Town Hall tomorrow at 6:45 p.m. PT to discuss #COVID19 and take as many questions as possible. I'll be joined by Dr. David Relman from Stanford University. You can sign up and listen ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

More good news. @US_FDA has authorized the first at-home #COVID19 test. This all-in-one test allows patients to collect a sample place it in the test unit and get the result in 30 minutes or less. This is absolutely essential to our efforts to halt the spread of the coronavirus https://t.co/o0yuFDjHzq

Today we’re celebrating more good news in the effort to develop a #COVID19 vaccine. It's extremely promising that two separate vaccine candidates have so far shown high efficacy and I congratulate all those involved in this life-saving work. https://t.co/V7njZgyYA8

By walking away from the opportunity to help defeat #COVID stabilize our economy and come to the aid of millions of Americans in great need President Trump has abandoned America. My full statement ⬇️ https://t.co/6anNUr9ySO

I'm holding a Telephone Town Hall TODAY at 3:55 p.m. PT to discuss how Congress is responding to #COVID19. Dr. David Relman of Stanford University will join me to answer your questions. To participate: dial (877) 229-8493 PIN: 13393 or register here ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

Nursing home residents are especially vulnerable to #COVID19. Congress MUST include funding for regular testing more PPE and stronger protections for older adults and people with disabilities in the next #COVID19 package. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/TgNN2HLZQr

Nursing homes have been devastated by the pandemic: at least 62k residents and workers have lost their lives to #COVID19. I introduced w/ @SenBobCasey the Nursing Home COVID-19 Protection and Prevention Act to provide $20B to protect residents and workers. #FamiliesFirst

Our economy is in a free fall. Tens of millions don’t have jobs & will lose federal unemployment today. Many are food insecure we face an eviction crisis & 150k Americans have died from #COVID19. Pres. Trump & Mitch McConnell’s response? Double the three-martini-lunch deduction.

I'm holding a 📞Town Hall tonight at 6:45 p.m. PT to discuss how Congress is responding to #COVID19 and answer as many questions as possible. I'll be joined by Dr. David Relman of Stanford University. To sign up and listen TEXT 833-898-5483 or visit ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

I'm holding another 📞Town Hall Today at 3:30 p.m. PT to discuss how Congress is responding to #COVID19. I'll be joined by Dr. David Ghilarducci EMS Medical Director for @sccounty. To sign up and listen TEXT 833-898-5483 or visit ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

Today I'm holding a 📞Town Hall at 3:00 p.m. PT to discuss how Congress is responding to #COVID19 and take as many questions as possible. I'll be joined by Dr. David Relman from Stanford University. To sign up and listen TEXT 833-898-5483 or visit ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

#COVID19 is fueling mental health problems & hurting the ability of caregivers to deal with the crisis. Mental health programs are struggling to treat an influx of patients while awaiting funding that Congress appropriated but HHS has been slow to release.

Happening now: I'm holding a hearing on 22 bills to strengthen mental health services in the U.S. The bills address increase in suicides racial disparities in outcomes telehealth coverage parity access to mental health services in schools & #COVID19 ⬇️ https://t.co/7fYBcAHQPT
Happening Now: @EnergyCommerce is questioning senior public health officials from the Trump Administration about their response to the #COVID19 crisis. Tune in here ⬇️ https://t.co/45rVbLRQdW

Starting next week the City of Mountain View will offer free #COVID19 testing at Shoreline Athletic Fields Monday through Thursday from 9 a.m. to noon and from 1 p.m. to 4 p.m. No appointment or doctor’s referral needed. Just bring your ID. More info ⬇️ https://t.co/c7vKAwIx6M
I asked @RheaBoydMD how racism (not race) has affected the #COVID19 pandemic.
I asked @NMAPresident what could have been done at the beginning of #COVID19 to prevent health disparities.

The #COVID19 mortality rate for Black Americans is 2.3x higher than the rate for White Americans. Other groups are disproportionally impacted as well. In Santa Clara County 24% of the county’s population is Latino but Latinos represent nearly 32% of all COVID19 deaths.

Happening now: I'm holding a Health Subcommittee hearing on the shocking racial disparities in #COVID19 & the American health care system. We'll consider how Congress can address inequities in communities of color. Tune in ⬇️ #HeroesAct #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/JhI3KEME7z

Santa Clara County is offering free #COVID19 testing at several pop-up testing sites this week. No doctor’s referral or insurance required! Click on the link below for more info. https://t.co/AEAseTk47d

@SCCgov is offering free testing for #COVID19 at Palo Alto City Hall beginning tomorrow June 16th between 10:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. until June 19th. Tests are free and available to all members of the public without a doctor's referral. Learn more here: https://t.co/c6UbKKvBcV

Today I'm holding a📞Town Hall at 4:30 p.m. PT to discuss how Congress is responding to #COVID19 and take as many questions as possible. To sign up and listen TEXT 833-898-5483 or visit ⬇️ https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

🚨Today I'm holding a📞Town Hall at 4:15 p.m. PT to discuss the crisis of racial profiling excessive force by law enforcement and our ongoing response to #COVID19. To sign up and listen TEXT 833-898-5483 or visit:  https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

Over 100000 Americans souls have been lost to COVID19. These individuals were loved and cherished by their families friends and nation. I introduced the COVID19 Pandemic Moment of Silence Act w/ @WhipClyburn to honor the victims. https://t.co/jgTSuQgaJD

The Nursing Home COVID-19 Protection and Prevention Act provides $20 billion in emergency funding for states and nursing homes to mount the needed strategies to protect this extremely vulnerable population of Americans. More here 👇 https://t.co/cMnd4drVkJ

One-third of all U.S. #COVID19 deaths are nursing home residents or workers. This staggering tragedy requires a corresponding response. Today I introduced the Nursing Home COVID-19 Protection and Prevention Act w/ @janschakowsky @RepShalala @RepDean and @sethmoulton

Tomorrow I'm holding a📞Town Hall at 5:40 p.m. PT for constituents in Santa Clara County to discuss #COVID19. I'll be joined by Dr. David Relman Stanford University. Sign up and listen here 👉https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2 https://t.co/QG19jDEh1w

Dr. Bright filed one of the most specific and troubling whistleblower complaints I've ever seen. He was not only ignored he was fired for being right. We can’t have a system where the government fires those who get it right & reward those who get it completely wrong. #COVID19

Mr. Michael Bowen the Executive Vice President of Prestige Ameritech will also speak to America’s crippling dependence on foreign countries for critical medical supplies – a public health issue and a national security issue. #COVID
As colleges and universities around our country continue to operate remotely during the #COVID19 pandemic we must help students who are most in need to continue their education.

@CMSGov recently announced #COVID19 enrollment flexibility for potential Medicare beneficiaries through June 17th. This is welcome news and I encourage people who may be eligible for Medicare to enroll in coverage here: https://t.co/PvIAqeTXO9

Reminder: I'm holding a Telephone Town Hall today at 4:30 p.m. PT for constituents in San Mateo County to discuss #COVID19. I'll be joined by State Senator Jerry Hill and @SMCHealth Deputy Chief Srija Srinivasan. Sign up and listen here: https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2 https://t.co/EfyTTaznLS

On #NationalNursesDay we pay tribute to the millions of nurses across our country who are leading our nation’s response to the #COVID19 pandemic. You are the greatest source of inspiration to the American people🙏.

I'm holding a Telephone Town Hall tomorrow at 4:30 p.m. PT for constituents in San Mateo County to discuss #COVID19. I'll be joined by State Senator Jerry Hill and @SMCHealth Deputy Chief Srija Srinivasan. Sign up and listen here: https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2 https://t.co/jtr3e9ZA7Q

Dr. Bright’s whistleblower complaint raises serious concerns about the Administration’s #COVID19 response including alleged gross mismanagement waste of funds abuse of authority and scientific censorship. 2/4

There’s still so much we don’t know about #COVID19 and the short- and long-term impacts of this novel virus on the human body and diverse populations. This information is essential for health care providers to develop effective comprehensive treatments for all patients.

On #WorkersMemorialDay we pay tribute to those who've been injured or lost their lives in the workplace. As our frontline workers continue their fight against #COVID19 we’re reminded how much more needs to be done to ensure everyone is guaranteed safe & healthy working conditions https://t.co/JiQCE5h37L

This year’s 105th Anniversary comes during a devastating time for our world and nation with the COVID-19 Pandemic and yet we as Armenian Americans have for the first time in our nation’s history the opportunity to celebrate the passage of the Armenian Genocide Resolution.
I'm holding a Telephone Town Hall today at 5:40 p.m. PT with Special Guest Dr. David Relman of Stanford University to discuss #COVID19.   Sign up and listen👇https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2

The Trump Administration is not being transparent about how it's responding to states’ requests for #COVID supplies. I’ve requested daily reports w/ an itemized accounting of #PPE and medical supplies and a list of where supplies are being sent. Read more: https://t.co/5dQV7xypb3

People with Medicaid need easy access to their medications during the #COVID19 emergency. That's why I introduced the MAIL Act which will increase mail-order pharmacy options and allow people to have a 90-day supply of medications. https://t.co/dpfzmkvUai
REMINDER: I'm holding a Telephone Town Hall today with Santa Clara County Executive Dr. Jeff Smith to discuss #COVID19.   Sign up and listen👉https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2 https://t.co/LkYOT7G4N8

I’m sharing important updates about #COVID19 and the economic relief effort in my weekly E-Newsletter. Sign up today to get these updates!   https://t.co/Ii3hB4epI0

Racism and xenophobia in any form are unacceptable. Now more than ever every community must unite against the common enemy that is #COVIDー19. I’m proud of our Asian community and stand with them during these challenging times and always will. https://t.co/vEeQVb48R0
California is leading the way. Let’s keep up the fight against #COVID19 and #StayHomeSaveLives https://t.co/uD9o0AFcbC

Today I introduced the Healthcare Broadband Expansion During COVID-19 Act w/ @repdonyoung to provide $2 billion to expand telehealth at public and nonprofit healthcare facilities including mobile clinics and temporary facilities deployed to respond to the #COVID19 pandemic

April is #SexualAssaultAwarenessMonth and I’m proud to join my colleagues to request dedicated funding for sexual and domestic assault programs during #COVID19. If you or a loved one needs support call 1-800-656-HOPE. https://t.co/1h0hosrAZL

The scammers are out in full force using fear and confusion around the #coronavirus to victimize our older adults and persons with disabilities. Don’t give your Medicare number to anyone over the phone or at your door. Learn more: https://t.co/blAw6Vnsmi
I’m proud to support the #PaycheckFairnessAct in the House and I’ll keep fighting to close the #wagegap because the need for equal pay does not begin and end with #COVID19. #EqualPayDay
And when the #COVID19 pandemic ends only 17% of the workforce will have access to #paidleave.
Women working as grocery store cashiers and physicians caring for #COVID19 patients are paid approximately 65 percent of what their male counterparts are being paid.

BRAVA to @129RQW @GavinNewsom and @USNationalGuard for stepping up to help feed the most vulnerable during #COVID19 🙏  https://t.co/mLTLMSrMPz

Today is the 10th anniversary of the Affordable Care Act. As we confront the coronavirus outbreak 20 million more Americans have health coverage thanks to the ACA. We need to #ProtectOurCare and keep making progress towards affordable quality health care for all. #ACA10
I urge CMS to urgently give California the flexibility to care for all #MediCal patients during #COVID19 👇👇👇 https://t.co/VE0C8N5PVL

Today I urged the President and VP to protect data privacy in our #COVID_19 response. Sensitive location and health data collected to #FlattenTheCurve should only be used for public health. Thanks @RepDelBene & @RonWyden for joining me https://t.co/Zus471Pz0V

My thanks to the 3000 constituents who joined my Telephone Town Hall yesterday to discuss what Congress is doing to respond to the #coronavirus.   REMINDER: if you haven't already you can sign up for today's Telephone Town Hall below 👇👇👇  https://t.co/JsNupwLdS2
Proud to join @GerryConnolly in urging the President to require mandatory teleworking for all eligible federal workers to #FlattenTheCurve and protect the public from #COVID19 https://t.co/E5pmJc1htd

This week on Wednesday March 18th and on Thursday March 19th I will be holding Telephone Town Hall Meetings to update my constituents on what Congress is doing to respond to the novel #coronavirus and answer your questions ☎️☎️

The House is meeting the coronavirus crisis head on by providing access to free testing for all Americans and expanding paid leave unemployment insurance nutrition assistance and federal funds for Medicaid. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/h0SozvPfaR

We must protect working families from facing the terrible choice between staying home to avoid spreading the virus and losing the paycheck they need to survive. Congress must pass the #FamiliesFirst Coronavirus Response Act https://t.co/TylolZBXpx

.@HouseDemocrats are taking #coronavirus seriously. Last week we passed an emergency response bill that provides nearly $1 billion for state & local health agencies to conduct vital public health activities such as lab testing & infection control. https://t.co/6miRFqBdtc
